description:
The long awaited follow-up to their original tarpit ideas video, Dalton and Michael dispel some misconceptions about what a tarpit idea actually is and how it applies to current technology trends like artificial intelligence. Don't get stuck!

Chapters (Powered by https://bit.ly/chapterme-yc) - 
00:00 - Intro
00:29 - Tarpit 2.0
02:47 - Key Factors
04:18 - Technology & Historical Factor
05:18 - X for Y
06:16 - Current Technology
06:54 - Artificial Intelligence
08:48 - Changing Behavior
10:09 - Arbitrage
12:40 - Takeaway
13:40 - Outro
title: Tarpit Ideas: The Sequel
